talk0024: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>...I guess I should go wake him up.<sp:5:0:0> Oh...he's awake.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm always happy to welcome guests who
aren't any work.<sp:0:4:0>...Come back soon.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad_01>...If you're looking for conversation, go

talk0026:

customers? Take off that mask or you
can show yourself out.
